cause.description:
Never content to rest on our accomplishments, Childrens Healthcare of Atlanta continually seeks new ways to help children stay healthier, recover faster and return to being a child sooner. Children's is working towards national preeminence through groundbreaking clinical firsts and accomplishments.
Friends Junior Committee is the young professional arm of Childrens Healthcare of Atlanta's volunteer organization Friends.
Find out more about us at www.friendsjuniorcommittee.org.
1. All children should have access to top notch medical care regardless of cost
cause.mission: Friends Junior Comittee empowers young professionals to make a difference in the lives of children while meeting others with the same passion and developing leadership within the community.
cause.name: Friends Junior Committee
